=== FreeNAS - for EPC ===

The purpose of this project is to build a shared storage device for EPC using <nowiki>[[http://www.freenas.org/|FreeNAS]]</nowiki>.  Once in place the storage will be shared to the EPC computer lab PC's using NFS.  If the need should arise the FreeNAS devise could also share out storage via CIFS and iSCSI.

 

==== List of Hardware We Have: ====
-----------------------------------------------------

4 - 80gig HD's

2 - 250gig HD's

1 - Antec Mid ATX Cases

1 - 1.8ghz

1 - MSI Mainboard

1 - 512megs ram

2 - IDE controller cards

5 - Rounded IDE Cables

1 - PCI video card
